fieldUpdates.description: Change the Record Type to "Standard - Closed"
fieldUpdates.name: Change Record Type to Standard - Closed

fieldUpdates.description:
Salesforce.com Change Request: NICC-013403
Set the "Ready to Close" check box field to "True"
fieldUpdates.name: Ready to Close = TRUE

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Record Type to "MTech Contractor - Closed"
fieldUpdates.name: Record Type - MTech Contractor - Closed

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Record Type to "Offshore Contractor - Closed"
fieldUpdates.name: Record Type = Offshore Contractor - Clos

fieldUpdates.description: Set the Status to "Pending - CEO Approval"
fieldUpdates.name: Status - Pending CEO Approval

rules.description: Sets the Status to "New" if the Bypass CEO Approval check box is un-checked
Sets the Status to HR Working if the Bypass CEO Approval check box is checked

rules.fullName: Cancel Change User Request Notification - Itesso BV
rules.description: Notification to cancel a submitted Change User Request Notification for Users in Itesso BV FFA Company group. NICC-033189
rules.formula: AND(RecordType.Name = "Change User Request") && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Cancelled") && ISPICKVAL(FFA_Company__c, "Itesso BV")

rules.fullName: Cancel Change User Request Notification - Newmarket UK
rules.description: Notification to cancel a submitted Change User Request Notification for Users in Newmarket UK FFA Company group. NICC-033189
rules.formula: AND(RecordType.Name = "Change User Request") && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Cancelled") && ISPICKVAL(FFA_Company__c, "Newmarket UK")

rules.fullName: Cancel Change User Request Notification - Newmarket US
rules.description: Notification to cancel a submitted Change User Request Notification within FFA Company USA. Sends an e-mail to staffingupdates@newmarketinc.com. NICC-032275

rules.fullName: Change User Request Notification - Create - Itesso BV
rules.description: Change User Request Notification for FFA Company Itesso BV group. NICC-033189
rules.formula: AND(RecordType.Name = "Change User Request", AND(ISPICKVAL(FFA_Company__c, "Itesso BV"), NOT(ISBLANK(Effective_Date__c ))) )

rules.fullName: Change User Request Notification - Create - Newmarket UK
rules.description: Change User Request Notification for FFA Company Newmarket UK group. NICC-033189
rules.formula: AND(RecordType.Name = "Change User Request", AND(ISPICKVAL(FFA_Company__c, "Newmarket UK"), NOT(ISBLANK(Effective_Date__c ))) )

rules.fullName: Change User Request Notification - Create - Newmarket US
rules.description: Change User Request Notification for FFA Company Newmarket US. Sends an e-mail to staffingupdates@newmarketinc.com. NICC-032275
rules.formula: AND(RecordType.Name = "Change User Request", AND(ISPICKVAL(FFA_Company__c, "Newmarket US")), NOT(ISBLANK(Effective_Date__c )))

rules.description:
Salesforce.com Change Request: NICC-013403
This Workflow Rule checks the "Ready to Close" check box once all required fields are completed

Salesforce.com Change Request: NICC-013403
Send an e-mail to IT when the IT Status is changed to "Submitted to IT"

Salesforce.com Change Request: NICC-013403
Change the Record Type to "Standard - Closed" once the Standard Job Req is set to Closed

rules.fullName: Standard Itesso Requisition Created - Finance Notification
rules.description:
Salesforce.com Change Reuest: NICC-021396
This Workflow Rule was originally created to send an e-mail to Federico Fiz in Finance when a new job requisition record is created with the "Standard" Record Type and a Financial Department of 070
Remove User Notification. Sends an e-mail to ithelpdesk@newmarketinc.com

Salesforce.com Change Reuest: NICC-020733
This Workflow Rule was originally created to send an e-mail to Fred Roue in Finance when a new job requisition record is created with the "Standard" Record Type

rules.fullName: Update to Change User Request Notification - Itesso BV
rules.description: Email alert when there is an update to a Change User Request record in FFA Company Itesso BV group. NICC-033189
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), RecordType.Name = "Change User Request", ISPICKVAL(FFA_Company__c, "Itesso BV"), NOT(ISCHANGED(OwnerId)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Status__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Business_Systems_Status__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(IT_Status__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Business_Systems_Owner__c)) )

rules.fullName: Update to Change User Request Notification - Newmarket UK
rules.description: Email alert when there is an update to a Change User Request record in FFA Company Newmarket UK group. NICC-033189
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), RecordType.Name = "Change User Request", ISPICKVAL(FFA_Company__c, "Newmarket UK"), NOT(ISCHANGED(OwnerId)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Status__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Business_Systems_Status__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(IT_Status__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Business_Systems_Owner__c)) )

rules.fullName: Update to Change User Request Notification - Newmarket US
rules.description: Email alert when there is an update to a Change User Request record for FFA Company Newmarket US. Sends an e-mail to staffingupdates@newmarketinc.com. NICC-032275
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), RecordType.Name = "Change User Request", ISPICKVAL(FFA_Company__c, "Newmarket US"), NOT(ISCHANGED(OwnerId)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Status__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Business_Systems_Status__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(IT_Status__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Business_Systems_Owner__c)) )
